BodyName: Committee on State and Federal Legislation

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Diaz, S.3163, and Assembly Member Arroyo, A.6053-A, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interests in certain real property accrued August 8, 1978 by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of the Bronx to Gardner Paige notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which applications may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 2347, Lot No. 12, on the tax map for the borough of the Bronx”.
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Authorizing NYC to reconvey its interests in certain real property accrued August 8, 1978 by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of the Bronx to Gardner Paige. (S.3163/A.6053-A)

Items.Title: State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Duane, S.4278, and Assembly Members Rosenthal and Kellner, A.6158-A, “AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law and the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to establishing a New York city animal population control program and an animal population control fund; and to amend chapter 115 of the laws of 1894 relating to the better protection of lost and strayed animals and for securing the rights of owners thereof, in relation to licensing fees.”
Items.ActionName: Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.ActionText: This SLR was Hearing on P-C Item by Comm
Items.MatterName: Establishing a New York city animal population control program and an animal population control fund. (S.4278/A.6158-A)

Items.Title: AND SUCH OTHER BUSINESS AS MAY BE NECESSARY

State Legislation Resolution requesting the New York State Legislature to pass bills introduced by Senator Diaz, S.3163, and Assembly Member Arroyo, A.6053-A, “AN ACT authorizing the city of New York to reconvey its interests in certain real property accrued August 8, 1978 by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of the Bronx to Gardner Paige notwithstanding expiration of the two year period within which applications may be made to the city to release its interest in property thus acquired; Block No. 2347, Lot No. 12, on the tax map for the borough of the Bronx”.
Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
Items.MatterName: Authorizing NYC to reconvey its interests in certain real property accrued August 8, 1978 by in rem tax foreclosure in the borough of the Bronx to Gardner Paige. (S.3163/A.6053-A)

Items.ActionText: A motion was made that this SLR be P-C Item Approved by Comm approved by Roll Call.
